name.ja: <ruby>集<rt>しゅう</rt></ruby><ruby>約<rt>やく</rt></ruby>の<ruby>魔<rt>ま</rt></ruby><ruby>導<rt>どう</rt></ruby><ruby>師<rt>し</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: During the turn you Normal Summoned this card, send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard.

effect.en: This card gains ATK equal to [the number of Spell/Trap Cards on your field] x 500 until the end of this turn. Then, if you have "Mage Power" in your Graveyard, this card gains an additional 1000 ATK until the end of this turn.
